title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 171.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 171.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Chapter 295 of the Laws of 1983 provided for the issuance
of nondriver identification cards. This Part is intended to implement the
provisions of that chapter in relation to the issuance of nondriver
identification cards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
171.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
